briefTitle: Deployment and Clinical Evaluation of an AI-powered Digital Oncology Biomarker Tool to guidE Treatment in TNBC
officialTitle: Deployment and Clinical Evaluation of an AI-powered Digital Oncology Biomarker Tool to guidE Treatment in TNBC
primaryOutcomeMeasure: To determine the reliability and performance of the process and AI tool
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Age ≥18 years
* Confirmed diagnosis of triple negative breast cancer (non-metastatic)
* Planned for neo-adjuvant systemic therapy
* Written consent to generic Tissue for Research donation

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients declined consent for generic Tissue for Research donation
